meanings.definition: The total heat content of a system.
meanings.sent1: The enthalpies of the substances in the reaction were carefully calculated.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study enthalpies to understand how much heat is involved in a process.
meanings.sent3: The enthalpies of the ingredients in the recipe determined how long to bake the cake.
meanings.sent4: The enthalpies of the elements in the mixture danced together like a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The enthalpies of the different components painted a colorful picture of the system's energy.

meanings.definition: The heat content of a chemical system at constant pressure.
meanings.sent1: Measuring enthalpies helps chemists predict how reactions will proceed.
meanings.sent2: The enthalpies of the reactants and products were compared to analyze the reaction.
meanings.sent3: The enthalpies of the solutions played a game of hide and seek in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The enthalpies of the substances whispered secrets about the chemical system.
meanings.sent5: The enthalpies of the compounds were like puzzle pieces fitting together perfectly.
